title: 72A.505 IMMUNITY.
text: No cause of action in the nature of defamation, invasion of privacy, or negligence may arise against an insurer, insurance agent, or insurance-support organization for disclosing personal or privileged information required to be disclosed under sections 72A.20, subdivision 11, and 72A.49 to 72A.504, provided no immunity exists for disclosing false information with malice or willful intent to injure any person.
